website_summaries.verdict: A cute boot that's easy to slip on and go. Perfect as rain boots.
pros: Easy to slip on and off
cons: May be too narrow for wide feet

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these boots! My new favorite pair! They were a bit squeaky at first, but I scuffed them against the pavement as I walked and that fixed the squeak. They're really warm too. I haven't actually gotten them wet yet, but there's rain in our forecast tomorrow so we'll see how they hold up! I've had tons of compliments! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K.Rich

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and high quality. I like the zipper on the side so the fit around the ankle fits better than if they just slipped on. I have thin legs and ankles so if the fit too loose my socks tend to creep down, which does not happen with these. These also are not overly heavy. They are soft and pliable and look great with jeans. I take between a size 8.5 and 9 and bought the 9 so I could have room for a thicker sock. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Darin

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy rain/snow boot.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I usually wear a 7, but purchased a 7.5 based on the size chart. They fit great with socks. And are very easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: N. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, good quality, just too small, darn
customer_reviews.text: These seem like very well made boots, but I can't keep them because they're too small in the weirdest way. I'm usually a 9 so I got a 9.5 and I feel like I could have gotten a 10 or 10.5 (which they don't make) they were very tight in the footbed but the length was good. I have what my family calls pencil feet because they're so skinny and long. I'm going to risk it and get the 10 as I plan to exchange them. They're adorable and for real hard work at the same time ( I work at a wholesale greenhouse) I'm excited to get the 10s. Man I hope they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of the boot so I'm going a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the size was too small or what but the top of the boot where the rubber meets the upper part of the boot rubs on the top of my foot and kind of cuts into it. I love the look of the boot so I'm going a size up to be sure. I hope they work out.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! For me, they are very comfortable to wear on a long-term basis (over four hours). The construction is very solid, and the side zippers are very convenient. I order my usual "Sperry Size" (9.5) and they fit perfect. I've worn them in the rain a few times already, and have not experienced any leaks. I also like that the interior is pretty soft behind the leather. The only area I find them lacking in arch support. It's not a deal breaker for me, but for those who need more support, you might want to consider purchasing arch support insoles for them.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy of Oz

customer_reviews.title: Oddly small
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is what everyone else has been saying. I checked the reviews and went half a size up since im typically a 6.5. Ended up getting a 7 and it was way too hard to fit. I was going to return them and just go even bigger but because the price has ranged so much from when i first got them i will basically have to pay double what i payed the first time. Just wish i could return for a bigger size at the same price i got them for. I am bummed since they are so cute and look well made.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I've worn them in New England snow, rain, and mud without fail. They're also comfortable and breathable enough for long walks and light hiking. Try look great, too! Ps: keep them away from dogs...they like to chew on the leather ties :)
customer_reviews.author: Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Originally ordered a 8.5 because reviews said the boots fit wide feet and run true to size. Had to send back, not too short, but the instep was too tight. Ordered a 9.5 and they are great! I have a high arch so I don't think I can wear super thick socks. Very comfortable, and truly water proof! Love the side zipper, makes slipping on and rushing out a breeze. Leather upper and entire boot really great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: ... worn them a few times so far and they're great. Comfy enough
customer_reviews.text: I've worn them a few times so far and they're great. Comfy enough. I know they're not really meant to be a snow boot, but I wore them in the snow this morning. Not extremely warm - I wouldn't wear them out sledding, but perfect for trudging through the snow from my car to my office. I have wide feet and I usually wear an 8 or 8 1/2. From the other reviews, I decided to size up to 9 and they fit nicely. I've been wearing with normal socks, but I would have room if I wanted to wear thick, warm socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the quality is excellent and they do the trick of waterproofing
customer_reviews.text: These boots are not just functional but stylish as well. I ordered the 7, a half size from my usual 6.5. It seems with boots that they all seem to acquire a larger. I got them in the red; the quality is excellent and they do the trick of waterproofing. They can even be worn in the snow but may not be quite warm enough if you wear them for a long period of time in the snow. A sharp looking boot for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie D. Weidhaas

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are too cute! They are fully lined. Easy to get on and off thanks to the zipper. They do not hurt my feet where the rubber and fabric meet like some boots I’ve had in the past. They fit as expected, even with my think boot socks.
customer_reviews.author: J Mauz

customer_reviews.title: I really love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I really love these boots. I've been kicking around in them for several days now and definitely glad I purchased them, especially with the wet weather we're having at the moment here in Indiana. The side zipper is the jam. The only thing that bothered me was there was a black ring around my calf for the first several days that I had to scrub off.
customer_reviews.author: Loraine Martin

customer_reviews.title: perfect garden and overall mud boots
customer_reviews.text: best boots ever because of the side zipper that makes it so easy to get on and off. i use these as garden boots primarily. complete water sealed and really well made. The height is perfect for summer/spring/fall
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these boots!!!! Sperry quality is simply amazing and the comfort of the boot is well past my expectations! I could wear these boots all day every day, rain or shine! The quality for these shoes is worth every penny of the purchase price, and I have already put them to good use in rain and storm conditions! Will NEVER buy another brand; Sperry is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Clunky
customer_reviews.text: These boots looked really clunky on my feet. Ordered a 1/2 size down and they were too small. the sole didn't feel like it would be very comfortable. Would not suggest for one with narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: kg620

customer_reviews.title: In love.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are gold. The color of the leather is a warmer tone than the picture shows, but they are gorgeous, functional, and well-made. They are perfect for walking in mud and water and have a soft lining that keeps them insulated. They don't have much traction on the ice, but they are a great rain/slush boot.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, I wore them to the SF Women's March on Saturday, and it started to pour at about 4 or so, by the time I got home ( and I took the Larkspur Ferry so I was out in the weather most of the time) my feet were warm and dry! I received quite a few compliments on them too! I Love them
customer_reviews.author: rhoda

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I ordered the same size as I would my regular sperry shoes and they fit perfect. I like that they "suction" to your feet, making it so my feel stay nice and warm in the cold. Good rain/snow boot, and super cute. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much! True to size. Easy to get on and off. Totally comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Andie M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine due to pen marks on the shoe but they were comfortable. I did notice that they ran a little smaller then another pair I have (in a different style). The leg/ankle area wasn't very big so keep that in mind when planning what you're going to wearing them with.
customer_reviews.author: Ren5245

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! The fit perfectly, are super comfy, and look great! And they definitely hold up to rain and puddles!
customer_reviews.author: dlhof

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes they are not only stylish they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are not only stylish they are comfortable I can wear them all day and my feet do not hurt. I am buying the brown pair bc I love these ones so much
customer_reviews.author: Arrick70

customer_reviews.title: Color is gorgeous leather is great
customer_reviews.text: Prettiest duck boots ever. The leather is soft and pretty. The rubber is a subtle burgundy that matches a lot of my hoodies and shirts from Pink
customer_reviews.author: Tia L Frost

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I wanted a winter/fall boot that I could slip on quickly as easily as I am always rushing around with my kids.. these are perfect! I wear my Sorels for major snow but these keep you warm on the go! I wish they had more colors in my size as I would definitely order them.
customer_reviews.author: wanderlust812

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I finally found a pair of comfortable, rain boots for walking and standing all day. Lining is not as heavy as snow boots, just right amount of warmth for California's rainy winter days.
customer_reviews.author: Kyokology

customer_reviews.title: 5 & they were comfortably "roomy" on me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8.5 in these Sperry boots because my sister had a size 8.5 & they were comfortably "roomy" on me. When mine arrived , I felt they were hard to get into & not as "roomy" as my sisters were. We ended up switching boots. She liked the tighter fit. These boots are not consistent in their sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: seemed like a really nice boot, but was not quite wide enough, i do have slightly wide feet, not a lot, but i think sperry runs somewhat narrow, wish it worked out but had to return.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots!! Got them on a Friday and wore them all weekend camping! So comfy! Wish I could wear them everyday! I usually wear size 8 so I ordered 8 and they fit well. Not sure I could wear really thick socks, but a good fit!
customer_reviews.author: Deana D.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and cute. They make your feet look small, not clunky at all. I thought my 9 was an 8 when I took them out of the box because they look so small. High quality product. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: stick with the traditional brown model
customer_reviews.text: i wish the laces tied more securely. placement on the side is less effective than traditional. the black color comes off the lining way too easily. whatever socks i wear end up black. i bought these because I loved my brown ones and thought these looked nice. they work less well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as cute as picture
customer_reviews.text: When your foot finally gets in the boot- the top fabric part spreads really wide. Therefore, it looks sloppy. Picture is deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Luna

customer_reviews.title: Dry Toes
customer_reviews.text: These are so practical for rain and snow and also look good too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this boots
customer_reviews.text: I love this boots! they are small in the arch. They are so stylish. I ordered 1/2 size more to fit with winter socks.
customer_reviews.author: vmm

customer_reviews.title: Caution! Black dye rubs off.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are cute and warm, but the black dye on the upper part of the boot rubs off on my jeans and skin whenever I wear them. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE! So much that I bought two pairs! The best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've had these boots for a few years now. I wear them often especially if it's raining or I'm working in the yard. They have held up very well, no complains. I do get compliments on them. Would purchase again but won't have too for a while, think they will last me another few years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are very comfortable. True to size. I went with this style because they a different from the typical lace up duck boot. They keep my feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: mermaidmomma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoes But a lot of pain
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to have these shoes the price was great, they looked amazing the grip at the bottom was perfect for walking in the rain. However unfortunately the shoes weren't the same size, they both said size 11 but right fit prefectly but the left foot had way to much space. You ever walk in the rain with one shoe shifting back and forth? It causes friction that leads to blisters on the soles of my feet after one day of use. It was awful. I was sad that I couldn't keep these beautiful shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! True to size, looks great, keeps my feet dry!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: too small!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boot but you need very small feet!! I have thin feet and it was so tight on the top of my foot that I had to return them! Was bummed because it had a very cute style!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are practical, warm since they are lined with fleece, and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Y.  Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: The shoe lover
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice just as the photo but it is a little tight on one foot but that is because I have a high in-step, they are a keeper. I have this brand in a casual shoe but it is a big kid wide size.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: My favorites
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wear them 3 or 4 days a week, and usually standing and walking most of the day. Very well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Raezen

customer_reviews.title: If I didn't socks I would have been fine, but it's winter here
customer_reviews.text: Needed to get 1/2 size larger in order to wear socks. If I didn't socks I would have been fine, but it's winter here.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the cold wet days
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit wide but I purposely ordered a size larger to ensure I won't have to fight to put them on and wear warm thick socks with them on cold wet days. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: SHIRLEY A. SOLOMON

customer_reviews.title: ... of the boot rubbed my foot & was not comfortable. I contacted Sperry & asked if it would ...
customer_reviews.text: The ridge across my right foot where the rubber connects to the top of the boot rubbed my foot & was not comfortable. I contacted Sperry & asked if it would stretch out & was told that it would not so I returned the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking boot. Good quality. Ran large. Would probably size down but one size smaller is twice the price if I return so I guess I'll just keep them and try to wear thick socks..
customer_reviews.author: Mom from PA

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Really love my Sperry top-siders!! Wanted them in black but they don't have my size. They keep my feet warm have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: link2mels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable and true to size. No breaking in was needed
customer_reviews.author: Dayna F.

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! Like, if I could marry these boots I totally would!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Lea

customer_reviews.title: Fit was too snug, but other than that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit was too snug, but other than that I was very impressed with the boot. Returning the 7.5 and buying an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Jarabek

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots. Just the right weight and lining, the upper section is very soft and comfortable. The fit is mostly what I expected, but I checked the box for somewhat small because they are a little bit difficult to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them and get so many compliments every time I ...
customer_reviews.text: Sold my lace up sperry duck boots for these. I love them and get so many compliments every time I wear them. Super warm and comfy
customer_reviews.author: hkelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but my feet were soaked
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these boots. They were cute and comfortable. But the first day I wore them in the rain my feet were soaked and by soaked, I mean every time I took a step they squished. I may have just had a defective pair though, but I am not sure I want to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: They seem very well made. A little snug when putting them on, but once they are on they fit comfortably. They are warm but not to warm. I have worn them all day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Boots may fit tight because of double insole
customer_reviews.text: At first the shoes didn’t fit, but after doing reasearch I found out that the insoles are removable. It turnedout that the boots came with two insoles and that is why they felt tight. I took one of the insoles out and the boots fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: 2ronihf

customer_reviews.title: my favorites
customer_reviews.text: bought these to wear at the farm, great fit and nice look!
customer_reviews.author: lily62

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Roomie, comfortable, and stylish I love them! Not to mention great in the rain !
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: for sure narrow- I sized up and still had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl J

customer_reviews.title: I expected it to have more give when I walk like a rain boot
customer_reviews.text: The boot is hard and not very flexible. I expected it to have more give when I walk like a rain boot. But it's kind of stuff and I have to make sure I have on thicker socks. The sole is not very comfy either. On the flip side I've gotten many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: andrianna cary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for PNW winters!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Pacific Northwest, so duckboots are a must during our loooon rainy season. These were waterproof and they have a bit of soft, comfy lining in them, making my feet feel like they were wrapped in a comfy fur blanket. For size reference, I have wide feet (D/E) and can sometimes wear 8 in regular C width or 7-7.5 in a wide-width. I got a size 8 and they fit very nicely when I wear medium thickness wool socks. If I wear thin socks, they're a little big, but not uncomfortably so.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love love! I'm always hoping it will rain now so I have an excuse to wear them, but they are so cute I wear them on sunny days too! If you're between sizes, size up (I sent my first pair, which were a little snug but still comfy, back for a half size bigger).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These feel very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i think would make these better would be if they had a pull loop in the back. I weAR A 9 BUT BASED ON REVIEWS i ORDERED 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: cl

customer_reviews.title: nice - the only thing I didn't like was the ...
customer_reviews.text: nice - the only thing I didn't like was the zipper on the side. It just did not look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect! Love them ! They are so cute! Can't say enough good things about them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get into with thicker socks at the instep but okay fit once past.
customer_reviews.author: Gumbogrrl

customer_reviews.title: SO very comfortable and fits as expected but after reading the previous ...
customer_reviews.text: SO very comfortable and fits as expected but after reading the previous reviews, I ordered a size larger. Very satisfied with this boot!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Pugh

customer_reviews.title: but i love the combination of tan and red
customer_reviews.text: The color is more of a fall red, but i love the combination of tan and red. I wore them the other night to a football game and they kept my feet nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: fitkick

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute and comfy. The only negative ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and comfy. The only negative is it was a little difficult getting them on with thick socks even after buying a half size bigger than what I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these boots so comfy and gonwith everything in winter!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots
customer_reviews.text: Cute and practical = a perfect combination. Oh, and comfortable, too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bareilles

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but workmanship not so good. Paid way too much to not get the perfect pair shoes! The stitching is all messed up on the inside right shoe and the box looks like it has seen better days. Sadly I'm sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie F

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are adorable! I have skinny ankles and they fit nicely, not bulky. They actually make my feet look small. Moderate warmth and has comfortable fleece lining. Can't beat the price for Sperrys!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They look even better in person and fit really well! They are a great price point and would make an awesome gift! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Hager

customer_reviews.title: 5 fit perfect, took a few days to stretch to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought them a half size bigger because I read they fit small. I wear size 8 and the 8.5 fit perfect, took a few days to stretch to be able to get on and off comfortably. I love these boots, they're cute, comfortable and keep my feet dry. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the rain!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box walked downtown (half an hour) with no complaints! Cute shoe, perfect fit, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and are comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I get excited when we are about to have snow or rain. They look so cute with skinny jeans! They fit perfect and feel comfortable. I'm so happy I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots. However, one boot is at least ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute boots. However, one boot is at least 1 inch bigger than the other! The tags both say size 8!
customer_reviews.author: Wilmot90

customer_reviews.title: :( too small
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them since I could not get my size 6 foot in it. I am a petite girl so I was surprised when they didn't fit, but I did like them!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Fast delivery and very stylish. I really like the Sperry brand better than my old LL Bean.
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Good price, arrived on time, fits good and the color was true to picture. Can't wait to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: super cute, super comfy and fit size seven feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the red, super cute, super comfy and fit size seven feet perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these boots! I get so many complements when I wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea McEliece

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, comfortable, cute and true to size. I have narrow feet and the fit is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: AGonzo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot. Looks great with a cabin sock and you can't beat the price for a Sperry boot!
customer_reviews.author: London Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. But you may need sole inserts with these for more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Bronx-all-day

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rain boot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rain boot and also great for cold weather. Fits great and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: wanda crowsley

customer_reviews.title: ... I've purchased this type of boot and I really like them. I can only wear thin socks with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've purchased this type of boot and I really like them. I can only wear thin socks with them
customer_reviews.author: Lori Handy

customer_reviews.title: Best rainboots ever!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are rugged, very comfortable & warm. Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: jlsds

customer_reviews.title: I think your normal show size is fine
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn them as yet, but from trying them on, they fit comfortably, and is very warm on the inside. I normally wear size 9.5/10 in shows. I am pregnant at the time of purchase, and my feet has expanded a bit. After reading the reviews that they run small, I went for size 11, huge mistake. It was waaaay too big, so I exchange them for my regular size 10. They fit great, with room for thick socks. I can't share any reviews beyond that, but they seem like a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G

customer_reviews.title: Best all-weather boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Comfortable, warm, stylish and I can be in them all day!
customer_reviews.author: Johana Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots are very snug in heel area. Overall fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Kleedehn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe, perfect for cold and wet weather! Thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia E. Portwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new sperry boots! They are just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome waterproof boots!
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute!! Ive been wearing them in the snow everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comfortable rain boot, good for fall/winter days in Indiana.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, had to buy another pair. I bought a half size bigger, to wear thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots ! I wish I got them much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Mueller

customer_reviews.title: ugh
customer_reviews.text: I returned these as they are SO ugly, and the quality was deplorable. The seams on the right boot at the top were missed altogether so they flapped. Poor quality control to say the least. There were strange scuff marks on the rubber as well, and they really just looked awful on me. If you're going to spend any money on duck boots, go for the original and the best, Sorel. I have absolutely nothing good to say about these.
customer_reviews.author: Chickincanada

product_meta.title: Sperry Top-Sider Women's Saltwater Pearl Seasonal Rain Boot
